contactToPlace.tooltip: Saving this address will enable you to find it in similar trips and help categorise them automatically.
contactToPlace.label: Label
contactToPlace.error: Specify which contact to save the address under

tripEdit.modeTooltip: The CO2 values in grams per kilometre (g/km) displayed may not always be representative of reality and may vary. It is important to take the CO2 values displayed with caution and to consider them as a general indication rather than an accurate representation of reality. Driving conditions, driver behaviour and other factors can lead to significant variations from the laboratory values, making it difficult to make a true comparison between different vehicles in terms of CO2 emissions.

recurring.title: Recurrence
recurring.text: Automatically apply this pattern to similar moves

content.done: The "%{filename}" file was created in the "Drive%{pathAppDir}" folder of your Cozy.
content.progress: The export of your trips is in progress, please wait...

welcome.title: Welcome to your CO2 Coach
welcome.text:
Let's improve our region together.

This application will allow you to record all your journeys, to understand their impact in terms of CO2 emissions, to compare yourself with the average user, and so on..
welcome.textA: This application, available free of charge for %{maxDaysToCapture} days as part of your package, will enable you to record all your journeys, understand their impact in terms of CO2 emissions, track your eligibility for the cycle allowance, compare yourself with the average user, and so on.
welcome.textB: This application, which is included in your Cozy package, will enable you to record all your journeys, understand their impact in terms of CO2 emissions, track your eligibility for the cycle allowance, compare yourself with the average user, and so on.
welcome.textC:
Let's improve our region together.

This application, which is made available to you by your %{sourceType} %{sourceName}, will enable you to record all your journeys, understand their impact in terms of CO2 emissions, keep track of your bike journeys, and so on.
welcome.textD: This application, which is currently in the experimental phase, will enable you to record all your journeys, understand their impact in terms of CO2 emissions, and notify you as soon as you are eligible for your %{sourceType} %{sourceName} cycling allowance, etc.

installApp.title:
Detect your movements
with the Cozy Cloud app
installApp.text: Install the Cozy Cloud application on your mobile phone to record all your journeys, understand their impact in terms of CO2 emissions, keep track of your journeys by bike, etc.

GPSStandby.title: Location detected
GPSStandby.text: Your first trip will be posted here a few hours after you make it.

changeAccount.title: No travel
changeAccount.text: No travel has yet been detected from the selected data source.

manifest.short_description: Keep track of your trips and analyze their impact on the environment.

apps.description: Required by the cozy-bar to display the icons of the apps

settings.description: Required by the cozy-bar to display Claudy and know which applications are coming soon

files.description: Required to access the files for saved your export of trips

coachco2.settings.description: Used to manage your Coach CO2 settings

settings.anonymous_participation: Participate anonymously in the calculation of average CO2 emissions

tripsCard.label: Compare your emissions to the average of other users of the application?

compareDialog.title: Compare anonymously
compareDialog.primaryText: In order to average the emissions of users, and because your Cozy has made a promise to you to never disclose your data without your explicit request, it will ask you for the right to send this data.
compareDialog.secondaryText: This data will be aggregated and anonymous and will not contain any identifiers or locations.

permissionsDialog.title: Request for permissions
permissionsDialog.primaryText: The CO2 Coach application requires the following permissions from your Cozy:
permissionsDialog.secondaryText: Once authorized, the permissions can be modified in the settings
permissionsDialog.why_asking: Why ask me for these permissions?

reasonsDialog.title: Reasons for permissions
reasonsDialog.content: Because your Cozy has made a promise to you to never disclose your private data, it will always ask you for the right to let an application send it out.

empty.title: Your trips eligible for the Bike Goal will be counted and displayed here.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content:
In order to encourage the use of alternative and sustainable modes of transport, the sustainable mobility package came into force on 10 May 2020.

Employees and agents who choose an alternative and sustainable mode of transport for their home-to-work journey will be able to receive a sum from their employer if the latter implements this scheme.

how_trips_detected.title: How are my trips detected?
how_trips_detected.content:
Your home-to-work journeys by bike will be automatically detected on the basis of your timetable and your speed.

If a journey is not automatically classified as a “Journey to and from work“, open the details of the journey and change the reason for the journey.

If the mode of transport for a journey is not automatically detected as “bike“, open the journey details and change the mode of transport to “bike“.

once_goal_reach.title: What to do once the goal is reached?
once_goal_reach.content: Once you've reached your target, you can congratulate yourself! You'll then be able to generate a certificate of honour that you can send to your employer.

deactivate.title: Do you really want to stop participating in the goal?
deactivate.content: You can always choose to participate again from the application settings.

success.text: Congratulations, you have achieved the “Bike to Work” goal 🎉
success.action: Receive my certificate |||| Benefit from my %{bountyAmount}€ package

alert.title: Be part of the change: cycle to work!
alert.text: Track your trips and generate a certificate for your employer if they offer the Sustainable Mobility Package (SMP) bonus.

edit.title: Modify the goal
edit.compare_progress: Compare my progress with that of my organisation
edit.compare_progress_noValue: Compare my progress with that of other users

settings.participation: Participate to the goal “Bike to work”
settings.showAlerter: Bike goal: Show bike goals alerter
settings.hideOnboarding: Bike goal: Hide bike goal onboarding
settings.showAlerterSuccess: Bike goal: Show the bike goal success alert

naming.title: Lastname and firstname
naming.nameLegend: Fill in the following details to generate a certificate of achievement in your name:

daysToReach.title: Set yourself a goal
daysToReach.legend:
Set a number of days for your home-to-work journeys by bike or scooter and track your progress with your CO2 Coach.

Once you've reached your target, you'll receive an alert and a certificate of achievement to send to your employer.
daysToReach.error: Set a more realistic goal. Enter a value greater than 0.

comparison.comparisonLegend:
You can display the average progress of the members of your organisation %{sourceName} who are participating in the objective. To do this, you will be asked to participate in the creation of this average.

Your progress data will be aggregated and sent anonymously, and will not contain any identifiers or locations.
comparison.comparisonLegend_noValue:
You can display the average progress of the other users who are participating in the objective. To do this, you will be asked to participate in the creation of this average.

Your progress data will be aggregated and sent anonymously, and will not contain any identifiers or locations.

certificateGeneration.title: Congratulations, you have achieved the “Bike to Work“ goal
certificateGeneration.content: A certificate has been generated to certify your success for %{year}. Email it to your employer now. |||| A certificate has been generated as proof of your success for the year %{year}. Forward it now by email to your employer to receive %{bountyAmount}€ !

tooltip.title: Your new trips are not saved
tooltip.text: Automatically record all your movements and discover your carbon footprint.

locationRefusedDialog.description:
Your Cozy needs access to additional data in order to help you analyze your movements. This data will NEVER be transmitted to anyone without your explicit request.

You will be redirected to the app's settings to authorize it to ALWAYS access your phone's position, even when the app is not in use, and PHYSICAL ACTIVITY, movement and shape data..

settings.enable: Record my movements with my mobile (GPS)

DefaultDialog.primary: Set as default transport for this category?
DefaultDialog.secondary: The transport mode will automatically be selected as default for all future trips detected for this transport type.

PDF.name: Certificate - Cycling to work (%{year}).pdf
PDF.title:
Certificate on honor
 of the success of the objective
 of the Sustainable Mobility Package
PDF.paragraph01: I, %{username}, certify on my honor that I have achieved the %{daysToReach} days sustainable mobility package objective by traveling from home to work by bike from January 1 to %{year}.
PDF.paragraph02: In addition to this certificate, I provide my employer with any useful proof of actual use of the bicycle, such as invoice or payment statements, insurance or maintenance of my bicycle.
PDF.paragraph03: Made to serve and assert what is right.
